reason: The market is displaying resilience, with Coinbase rallying despite an earnings miss and altcoins showing strength. This absorption of negative news points towards an accumulation phase where demand is meeting supply. However, regulatory uncertainties surrounding stablecoins and DeFi, coupled with the Coinbase miss and leadership changes at the Ethereum Foundation, introduce significant fundamental and systemic risks. This mixed environment necessitates caution and close monitoring for clearer directional signals.
headlines: Crypto group counters Wall Street bankers with its own stablecoin principles for bill
Wall Street analysts slash Coinbase price targets after Q4 miss — but shares rally
U.S.-based DeFi group urges UK FCA to anchor crypto rules to 'unilateral control'
Ethereum Foundation leadership shake-up: Tomasz Stańczak out as co-executive director
CoinDesk 20 performance update: Uniswap (UNI) jumps 5.4%, leading index higher
